participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, enjoys trying new things and meeting new people.
participant_1.background: My mom was a hairdresser. I drive a prius. My favorite color is red. I work at a coffee shop.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Quirky and adventurous, loves to explore and has a playful sense of humor.
participant_2.background: My brother thinks he s a viking. I have a pet skunk. My nails are painted green. I live in a nice attic apartment in Portland, OR. My master's degree is in Italian literature.

content.text: Hi, I'm new to Portland. What's the best coffee shop in town?
Oh, there are so many great coffee shops in Portland. I love Coava Coffee on Hawthorne. They have amazing coffee and a great atmosphere.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll have to check it out.
My pleasure! So, what do you do for fun?
I love to read and go to concerts. I also love to play video games.
Me too! I love reading and going to concerts. I'm not much of a gamer though.
What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm really into indie rock and folk music right now.
Me too! I love indie rock and folk music. I'm a big fan of the Lumineers and Mumford & Sons.
Oh, I love the Lumineers! I saw them in concert a few years ago and it was amazing.
Me too! I saw them in concert last year and it was one of the best concerts I've ever been to.
That's awesome! Do you have any other hobbies or interests?
I love to cook and bake. I'm also really into fashion.
Me too! I love to cook and bake too. I'm not much of a fashionista though.
Well, I think you have great style!
Well, it was nice talking to you. I'm going to head to Coava Coffee now.
Oh, have fun! I've been meaning to go there myself.
